hecss_sampler[source]

hecss_sampler(fname:>=None, T:float <Target temperature in Kelvin>=300)

Run HECSS parser on the structure in the directory
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
hecss_sampler("CONTCAR", 600)

Run HECSS on CONTCAR at 600K
{% endraw %}
